title: Does anyone else have Uverse?
body: So my isp is ATNT uverse and it might the worst internet when playing league ever.  I live with other people who it seems the second they use the internet imlagging in league.  Does anyone else have this prob if they have atnt or is it something just im having problems with.  I mean it literally seems like the second someone uses a toaster i will lag, thats how much i lag when people are using the internet.  I miss comcast.
